text:
Takeaway only and just started operations. Solid kebab but it‚Äôs fast and good for a quick bite when you‚Äôre not feeling Indian or Chinese. The bread looks thick and dense but it was quite fluffy!

Convenience level bumps it up to a 5 for me but not something I‚Äôd travel or queue for. Best of luck to the new proprietor!

A random location but kebab is good! Generous amount of chicken, the sauce compliments the bread and meat well. I personally feel price point is fair. Staff serving me was really friendly! Overall a pleasant experience. They only do take aways.
The kebab is epic! the sauces and kebab are very serious and rich in flavour. Highly recommended. A must eat when you reach Changi Road and Singapore. The vibes & ambiance are also superb!

Halal German style d√∂ner kebab - which is a flatbread stuffed with kebab and veggies, and a choice of sauce. Flatbread was EXCELLENT - fluffy with a tinge of sourdough taste. Tasty meats and fresh veggies - can‚Äôt ask for more. Also üíØfor the mini alfresco vibe. If you‚Äôre looking for a wrap, go for the Durum. There‚Äôs a gelato shop next door opening in April 2025 if you need a pick me up after a hearty kebab. Highly recommend the dark cacao and pistachio flavours. The mulberry sorbet was also refreshing.

Bismillahi Masya Allah.. good things must share especially when it‚Äôs halal. Had the Chicken Doner Kebab and it‚Äôs delightfully delicious. The bread is uniquely soft yet ‚Äúcrunchy‚Äù sourdough-like with  the filing so generous. The sauce is yummy with a tinge of all tastes, super flavourful. A must try especially if you are a fan of kebabs! If you are not, you will convert to one (like my daughter)! I‚Äôm not a fries fan but we love the fat yet crunchy fries too. And it just beside Masjid Kassim so after terawih, i ate 1 and im so glad to buy back too. It remained yummy for sahur too. I‚Äôm gonna get again next weekü§≠
